INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: For the calcium salts administered via oral route: decrease of the digestive absorption of the bisphosphonates
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take calcium salts and antacids at a different time from the bisphosphonates (from 30 minutes minimum to more than 2 hours apart, if possible, depending on the bisphosphonate).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the tetracycline antibiotics
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the tetracycline antibiotics (more than two hours apart if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of serious arrhythmias, even lethal ones, with the calcium salts administered by IV route.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with the calcium salts via IV, except for parenteral supplementation

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of hypercalcemia due to decrease of the urinary elimination of the calcium.
Decrease of the digestive absorption of the estramustine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the estramustine (more than 2 hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the iron salts by oral route: decrease of the digestive absorption of the iron salts
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the iron salts at a different time from meals and in the absence of calcium.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the absorption of the thyroid hormones
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the thyroid hormones (more than 2 hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the calcium salts administered by oral route: decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the calcium salts (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the zinc by the calcium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the zinc (more than 2 hours apart, if possible).
